Package org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.cache

This package is all about caching resources downloaded from mapillary.com for faster access to those resources in the future.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheUtils
    Utility methods for working with cache.
    MapillaryCache
    Stores the downloaded pictures locally.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CacheUtils.PICTURE
    Picture quality
    MapillaryCache.Type
    Types of images.

Package org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.cache Description

This package is all about caching resources downloaded from mapillary.com for faster access to those resources in the future.
